resp = client.search(
    index="my-image-index",
    size=10,
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": {
                "knn": {
                    "field": "image-vector",
                    "query_vector": [
                        -5,
                        9,
                        -12
                    ],
                    "k": 3
                }
            },
            "filter": {
                "term": {
                    "file-type": "png"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
